name: Kris' Promotion
text:
[Kris' Promotion]

[In the ancient legends of Indonesia, the [Kris Swordsman] is a legend on the battlefield. Known for their fearless courage and exceptional combat skills, they have long been a symbol of greatness. Now, your Kris Swordsman has completed its training and is ready to step onto the battlefield. As the call to arms echoes through the land, they have been blessed by the gods, randomly gaining one of the following special abilities: [Restlessness], [Recruitment], [Ambition], [Invulnerability], [Heroism], or [Sneak Attack]. This will give them an edge in future battles. Great leader, your army is ready to embrace glory, and their legend will be written by you.]

name: Spice Gift
text:
[Spice Gift]

[Indonesia, this land blessed by the sea, now receives the gifts of the Spice Islands. Your coastal cities are ready for wealth and prosperity. Choose a unique luxury good to start trading and double your rewards. [Clove], [Nutmeg], and [Pepper] are available, each can be chosen once. Make your choice wisely, great leader.]

name: Choose Your Ideology

[Choose Your Ideology]
